data.title: Popular spot with a huge menu
data.text:
Average-to-reasonable prices and good service make this a busy lunch stop for the nearby work crowd. Around noon, the place is hopping! 

Make sure you know the routine: Seating in the main area is available first-come AFTER you place your order at the counter. The small bar area at the rear has table service, so find a table and wait for the waitress.

The menu is huge and is sure to have somthing for just about everyone. The burgers are delcious. I also like to customize a chicken panini; their chicken is not deli-style, so that's a plus. My friends like the Tower Club -- a beast of a sandwich that could easily be two meals.

data.title: Worse breakfast and revolting coffee
data.text:
We had breakfast at this restaurant...it was hard to believe it could be so bad. I ordered well done poached eggs.....not complicated? They were almost raw....the coffee which is supposedly with 4 shots of espresso was more like dish water, even after an extra shot. I did not eat or drink either. The service was non existent, not even a side ways glance or any interest in customer satisfaction. 
DONT WAST YOUR MONEY! Go anywhere else.

data.title: We'd go again
data.text: Tried it with a Groupon.  Went for an early dinner.  Not busy, but work crowd started coming in at end of work day.  Bar seems popular.  Food was good, as was the service.  Only disappointment was ciabatta rolls were all gone, so our food came on regular burger buns.  Still very good burgers,and fries, for frozen type, were very good.  Not the nicest part of town, but safe.  Right across the street from a police presence.  Want to go again and have the ciabatta rolls with the burgers.  Looks like a good place for breakfast or lunch, also.

data.title: Tacoma's Tower serves EXXXXellent Breakfast!
data.text: I love the "Mini Tower" breakfast~ 1 egg, hash brown's, choice of bacon, ham or sausage and toast. This selection is just the right amount of breakfast to start my day. The biscuit's and gravy selection is one to keep going back for. I think I am about even on the above breakfast selections.  The winner for lunch is their BLT.  This sandwich should be world famous. The Chef,Tom; really knows his way around comfort food and puts it out in a remarkably quick manner... Not fast food~ Fantastic food FAST!

data.title: A Quick Lunch
data.text: I came by here for a quick lunch because I was on jury duty and had limited time.  I ordered the Chef Salad and a drink.  My salad was brought out quickly and with the modifications I ordered.  The prices were reasonable and I was happy with my lunch.  This place is very busy during lunch.  I'm looking forward to another visit.

data.title: Not the best
data.text:
We went here on a Monday morning hoping for a great cup of coffee and a breakfast sandwich. Other reviewers spoke highly of this place. The food was just ok. The coffee was weak. I had an Americano with cream and honey (my usual) , and I had to go back and buy another shot to put in it because I couldn't taste the coffee! 
But mostly I wanted to mention, the place needed a good cleaning! It seemed like it hadn't been cleaned after a busy weekend. And the thick dust on the chair rails had been there even longer. There were zero paper products in the women's room. 
That being said, the people were friendly enough and the experience wasn't awful. Just not the best...

data.title: A great lunch find in Tacoma
data.text: I was told if this place for a nice lunch. They have a wide variety of sandwiches and other selections that are fresh. The staff is friendly and helpful. Get the club sandwich but don't get anything to go with it. The sandwich is huge and I couldn't get my mouth around it.  A nice find here in Tacoma.

data.title: Twice in a day
data.text:
I chose this restaurant for breakfast because it was near the place I had a business appointment .
The breakfast panini was delicious it had scrambled eggs, sausage , spinach, tomato, jalapeño, and mushrooms. The cook treated me and brought my order. It is a nice place, not expensive and just good. Then, to my surprise, lunch provided at my appointment was a good tuna sandwich.
